    Package index

    Read

    These functions are the link between R and your data.

    read_animalta()
    Read AnimalTA data
    read_deeplabcut()
    Read DeepLabCut data
    read_idtracker()
    Read idtracker.ai data
    read_movement()
    Read movement data
    read_sleap()
    Read SLEAP data
    read_trackball()
    Read trackball data
    read_treadmill()
    Read treadmill data
    read_trex()
    Read TRex data

    Clean

    These functions ensures that your data is ready for analysis.

    smooth_track()
    Smooth tracks

    Calculate

    These functions is where your results begin to emerge.

    calculate_kinematics()
    Calculate kinematics
    calculate_statistics()
    Calculate summary statistics
